name: Search Offenes Parlement for MdB
description:
Searches the API of http://offenesparlament.de/ for information about a member of the german parliament. See http://offenesparlament.de/info/daten for more options. 

the forename-lastname-party must be specified as a node (f.e. wolfgang-bosbach-cducsu). The "id"-key of the raw-data may be used as Object ID
